title: Chapter XX - Commission on ethics and lobbying in Government
content:

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. Part 930 - Honoraria (§ 930.1 to 930.9)
